primertools

The primertools package provides helper functions for preparing datasets for import into
PRIMER-e software, and for reading common PRIMER output files
(e.g. PERMANOVA results) for downstream analysis in R.

primertools is designed to support reproducible workflows that combine PRIMER with R.
It does not reimplement PRIMER analyses.

About PRIMER

PRIMER is a widely used software package (made by PRIMER-e) for multivariate analysis of ecological community data.
Although R provides packages with overlapping functionality, PRIMER software is the authoritative implementation for the routines it provides.

  • PRIMER-e website
  • PRIMER-e learning hub
  • Should I use PRIMER or R?

Installation

You can install the development version of primertools from GitHub with:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("anhsmith/primertools")
library(primertools)
